channel.title: Hijack on violetear
channel.description: Recent content in Hijack on violetear

item.title: Websocket Hijack
item.description: To use all the available interfaces in the net/http packages, disable the LogRequests option: router := violetear.New() router.LogRequests = false The reasons for this is that when using LogRequests a custom responseWriter is used and it doesn’t extend to all available interfaces in the net/http package.
